list_definition.definition: to wind together (especially strands of hair)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She wants me to braid her hair with beads.

list_definition.mean_english: dải viền trang trí quần áo
list_definition.definition: threads twisted together and used as decoration on uniforms etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The admiral’s uniform was decorated with gold braid.
